name: Gift Sets
description:
Just in time for the Holidays! What's a better gift than high-quality, hand-crafted, eco-friendly moisturizing massage candles sent directly to your door? Choose from any of the following gift sets, include the recipient's physical address and email and your gift will be on it's way before December 15th.

Biodegradable & dermatology-tested for use as a massage oil & body moisturizer (IN ADULTS ONLY) as well as a candle.

Vegan 

Made from NON-GMO Eco Soy & coconut oil wax.

Wicks are made from sustainable, organic wood

Containers can be washed out with soap & water & re-used or recycled.

Candles burn approximately 10 hours per ounce.

Please choose from the following Combinations: (S&H is included in the price)

-Winter Set: 1 each of the Northern Christmas, Frosted Pine, Amaretto Nog, Pumpkin Creme Brulee & Firewood candles

-Essential Oil Set of 3: 1 each of the Organic Lavender, Organic Eucalyptus & Patchouli Rosewood candles (No synthetic fragrances)

-Essential Oil Set of 6: (FREE S&H) The Essential Oil  Set of 3 + 1 each of the Organic Lemongrass, Organic Geranium and Thieves candles (No synthetic fragrances) 

-Provocative Set: 1 each of the Butt Naked, Rich Bitch, Secret Lover, Marilyn & Juicy Booty candles

-Novelty Set: 1 each of the Maple Smoked Bacon, Hot Buttered Popcorn, Watermelon Bubblegum, Fresh Cut Grass & Wet Dirt candles

-Organic Baby Set: 1 each of the Happy Baby (Organic Geranium Lavender), Decongested Baby (Organic Eucalyptus Tea Tree) and Deodorized Baby (Organic Lemongrass) candles *NOT RECOMMENDED TO BE USED AS A MOISTURIZER OR MASSAGE OIL FOR CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 5*

name: Organic Baby Candles
description:
These candles are made with the highest quality Essential Oils on the market! Certified Organic & Fair for Life (one step above Fair Trade) they are all therapeutic grade and beneficial to you and your baby's senses. *Please note: These candles are NOT recommended as moisturizer or massage oil for babies under the age of 1, due to their sensitive skin

Decongested Baby: Medicinal & cool, this candle is perfect for when you're little one is feeling congested and needs a little fresh 'vapor rub' smell in the air. Made from a mix of Organic Eucalyptus (Eucalyptus globulus) and Organic Tea Tree (Melaleuca alternifolia) essential oils

Deodorized Baby: Babies smell wonderful... most of the time. This Organic Lemongrass (Cymbopogon flexuosus) candle is a natural odor-eater and helps neutralize those not-so-nice baby smells that we'd like to forget about

Happy Baby: Everyone loves a happy baby! This candle is a peaceful mix of Organic Geranium (Pelargonium graveolens) and Organic Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) *Geranium is known to cause reactions in those with sensitive skin- therefore, it is NOT recommended to use this candle as a moisturizer or a massage oil on children of any age or on anyone of any age with sensitive skin*

Biodegradable & dermatology-tested for use as a massage oil & body moisturizer (IN ADULTS ONLY) as well as a candle

Vegan 

Made from NON-GMO Eco Soy wax

Containers can be washed out with soap & water & re-used or recycled.

Candles burn approximately 10 hours per ounce

name: Jason's Candles
description:
This Summer, my very dear friend Jason was diagnosed with lymphoma of the brain and spine... Shocking news to say the least. It started with a severe headache that led him to the ER which ended with a meningitis diagnosis - not fun but treatable. Further tests revealed it was much more. 

The weekend was filled with more tests and visits with doctors. He eventually received two ports to fight the cancer with chemo treatments and a (NEGATIVE) bone marrow biopsy! (Yeah!) 

The doctors tell us that they are confident that they caught the cancer very early and they will be able to get it into remission. Jason is currently nearing the home stretch of 8 rounds of chemotherapy and his doctors no longer think he will need a stem cell transplant! 

We KNOW Jason will be a Cancer Survivor and he will get there with all of the support from friends, family and special people just like you...

When you purchase one or more of Jason's Candles, 50% of the proceeds will benefit him directly & help with the huge medical bills he has incurred throughout this whole process. Not only will you be helping Jason, you will be enjoying a candle that is both beneficial to the environment as well as the consumer. Each candle is hand-crafted from a mix of non-GMO soy and organic coconut wax and can also be used as a massage oil and a body moisturizer. The wicks are made from sustainable, organic wood and because the wax is completely biodegradable, the containers can be washed out with soap and water and re-used or recycled. 

Jason's favorite scent, Organic Sweet Orange and Olive, is available as well as a few of our most popular Fall/Winter scents. See below for descriptions. 

Amaretto Nog: A Francis Ellis Winter favorite! A holiday warmer of sweet almond and vanilla.

Organic Eucalyptus: Medicinal & cool, this candle is made with certified organic and Fair for Life Eucalyptus globulus essential oil and is perfect for when you're feeling congested and need a little fresh 'vapor rub' smell in the air (or on your chest!)

Fall Cabin: Think woody... cedar and oak delicately tempered with cinnamon, bayberry, and other Fall-like spice favorites.

Firewood: Our most popular Holiday scent! The sweet, comforts-of-home smell of burning wood in a cozy room with a fireplace... It will blow your mind! Complete with a crackling wooden wick!

Frosted Pine: Sweet orange and hints of fruit add a lively accent to this holiday creation. Fresh western cedar blends with fir balsam, patchouli and amber. Sweetened with vanilla and blended with wild berry.

Northern Christmas: Fresh wintry Balsam Pine & lightly spiced cranberry. Surprisingly pleasant and refreshing, puts an exciting new twist on pine!

Organic Sweet Orange & Olive: Jason's Favorite! Certified organic & Fair for Life Sweet Orange (Citrus sinensis) essential oil blended with a touch of Olive Blossom. Sophisticated, citrusy and clean.

name: Fall & Winter Scents
description:
Biodegradable & dermatology-tested for use as a massage oil & body moisturizer as well as a candle. All candles come in white unless specified otherwise. 

*It is not recommended to use any colored wax as a moisturizer or massage oil as it may stain the skin.*

Made from NON-GMO Eco Soy wax.

Containers can be washed out with soap & water & re-used or recycled.

Each candle burns approximately 10 hours/oz.

Amaretto Nog: A Francis Ellis Winter favorite! A holiday warmer of sweet almond and vanilla

Buttery Gingerbread: Melt in your mouth, fresh from the oven and slathered with butter

Christmas Cookie: Sweet sugary aroma of fresh baked sugar cookies

Eggnog: Blend of rum, cinnamon, and fruits

Fall Cabin: Think woody, like cedar and oak delicately tempered with cinnamon, bayberry, and other Fall-like spice faves

Firewood: FEC's most popular Holiday scent! The sweet, comforts-of-home smell of burning wood in a cozy room with a fireplace... Complete with a crackling wooden wick!

Frosted Pine: Sweet orange and hints of fruit add a lively accent to this holiday creation. Fresh western cedar blends with the heart of fir balsam as earthy accents of patchouli and crisp green highlights surround the botanical blend. Soft amber is sweetened with vanilla and blended with wild berry at the base of the scent

Hot Buttered Rum: A delightful mix of almond, hot rum and buttery vanilla cake

Thieves: Therapeutic grade essential oil blend (cinnamon, clove, lemon, eucalyptus, and rosemary) that is based upon a 15th century recipe found in the Royal English Archives. This recipe protected a group of thieves from the black plague even as they robbed the highly contagious bodies of the plagues dead victims. During the course of their plundering, four of the thieves were caught by the king’s men. In exchange for not being burned at the stake, the four thieves disclosed the secret of their immunity.

Mistletoe: Woody scents of berries, pine, holly and of course, mistletoe

Northern Christmas: Fresh wintry Balsam Pine & lightly spiced cranberry. Surprisingly pleasant and refreshing, puts an exciting new twist on pine!

Pumpkin Creme Brulee: Sweet pumpkin puree scent topped with notes of cinnamon and caramelized brown sugar

Spearmint: Pure Mentha spicata (Spearmint) Essential Oil

Wintergreen Melange: A therapeutic blend of peppermint, wintergreen, tea tree, eucalyptus and spearmint essential oils

Witch's Brew: Spicy, herbal & daring...

name: Organic Candles
description:
These massage candles are made with the highest quality Essential Oils on the market! Most are certified organic & Fair for Life (one step above Fair Trade) but they are all therapeutic grade and beneficial to your mind, body and soul... ahhh...

Bergamot Rose: A complex combo of Bergamot (Citrus bergamia) Caraway (Carum carvi) Armoise Mugwort (Artimisia alba) Cinnamon (Cinnamomum zeylanicum) Pimento Leaf (Pimenta dioica) Cedarwood (Cedrus atlantica) and Clove (Syzygium aromaticum) oils

Organic Citrus Eucalyptus: A clean zippy combo of Organic Sweet Orange (Citrus sinensis) Organic Tangerine (Citrus reticulata) and a hint of Organic Eucalyptus (Eucalyptus globulus)

Organic Cinnamon: Our Cinnamon candle is made with certified Organic and Fair for Life Cinnamomum zeylanicum oil. It is steam distilled from the leaf, instead of the bark, therefore has higher analgesic properties. Not only does this candle have one of the most recognizable scents in the world, it is a natural air disinfectant and increases circulation, so it's perfect to warm up those cold feet!

Organic Eucalyptus (Eucalyptus globulus): Medicinal & cool, this candle is perfect for when you're feeling congested and need a little fresh 'vapor rub' smell in the air

Fennel Cypress: A woody complex mix of Fennel (Foeniculum vulgare) Cypress (Cupressus sempervirens) Juniper Berry (Juniperus communis) Pine (Pinus sylvestris) Rosemary (Rosmarinus officinalis) Ravensara (Ravensara aromatica) Sweet Basil (Ocimum basilicum) Ginger Root (Zingiber officinale) German Chamomile (Matricaria recutita) Black Pepper (Piper nigrum) and Wild Oregano (Origanum vulgare) Essential Oils

Organic Geranium (Pelargonium graveolens): Floral, sweet & fruity. Geranium is a bit more expensive than the others, but well worth the cost. Geranium can either be a pick-me-up or extremely calming, depending on your chemical make-up. *Exercise caution if/when applying this candle to your skin. Geranium is known to cause reactions in those with sensitive skin

Organic Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia): Floral, herbaceous & sweet,  soothing and refreshing. Because it is the most versatile of all essential oils, no home should be without it. Lavender is an adaptogen, and therefore can assist the body when adapting to stress or imbalances. This is the perfect massage candle to use after a bath or just before bed

Organic Lavender Chamomile: a 50/50 mix of Organic Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) & Chamomile fragrance oil. This massage candle is a must for anyone with frazzled nerves

Organic Lavender Cotton: a 50/50 mix of Organic Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) & Spotless Cotton fragrance oil~ smells like clean lavender laundry!

Organic Lavender Eucalyptus: Organic Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) with just a tiny hint of Organic Eucalyptus (Eucalyptus globulus)

Lavender Sage: A peaceful blend of Lavender (Lavandula angustifolia) Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata) Sage (Salvia officinalis) and Geranium (Pelargonium graveolens) essential oils.

Organic Lemongrass (Cymbopogon flexuosus): By far our BEST SELLER! Calming, revitalizing, invigorating, and inspiring. Lemongrass is an ODOR-EATER (great to neutralize smoke & pet smells) and also a BUG REPELLENT

Moroccan Ylang: A Spicy mix of Geranium (Pelargonium graveolens) Palmarosa (Cymbopogon martinii) Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata) Cinnamon (Cinnamomum zeylanicum) and Hyssop (Hyssopus officinalis) with just a touch of Patchouli (Pogostemon cablin)

Patchouli Rosewood: One of our BIGGEST SELLERS! You'll love this earthy combo of Patchouli (Pogostemon cablin) Cedarwood (Cedrus deodara) Rosewood (Aniba roseodora) and Ylang Ylang II (Cananga odorata var genuina) essential oils

Organic Peppermint (Mentha piperita): This fresh menthol candle is both energizing & soothing. Peppermint helps to soothe tension headaches, is great for increasing stamina & is a known aphrodisiac 

Organic Peppermint Eucalyptus: Certified Organic and Fair for Life Peppermint and Eucalyptus essential oils make up this anti-microbial fresh and clean candle
Spearmint (Mentha spicata): A minty, fruity aroma great for easing headaches & stress

Organic Sweet Orange and Olive: Organic Sweet Orange (Citrus sinensis) blended with a touch of Olive Blossom fragrance oil. Sophisticated, citrusy and clean

Organic Tangerine: This one is for the Citrus lovers! Organic Tangerine (Citrus reticulata) mixed with a hint of Organic Sweet Orange (Citrus sinensis)

Wintergreen Melange: Clean and refreshing! This Wintery mix consists of Peppermint (Mentha piperita) Wintergreen (Gaultheria procumbens) Tea Tree (Melaleuca alternifolia) Eucalyptus (Eucalyptus globulus) and Spearmint (Mentha spicata) essential oils

Biodegradable & dermatology-tested for use as a massage oil & body moisturizer as well as a candle

Vegan 

Made from NON-GMO Eco Soy wax

Containers can be washed out with soap & water & re-used or recycled.

Candles burn approximately 10 hours per ounce

name: Provocative Candles
description:
These massage candles are made to tantalize & titillate! Perfect to take on the go for late-night rendezvous or for a quiet evening at home alone.

Big Sexy's Chocolate Love: Truly sinful, this decadent masterpiece of chocolates is deep, rich, sexy and will make you crave Godiva

Butt Naked: A Clean, sassy, sweet mix of Pomegranate & Georgia Peach

Edible Panties: Think strawberry liquorice candy

Juicy Booty: A certain 'juicy booty'd' celeb's signature scent... An intoxicating and sensual blend of jasmine, tuberose, white gardenias, pink gardenias, vanilla, orchid, musk and sandalwood

Lick Me Up & Down: An exotic & seductive scent... Rich with notes of fruit and tropical paradise. Raspberry, Melon & Citrus with a hint of floral

Marilyn: Indicative of the perfume Marilyn loved the most... CN5 

Rich Bitch: One of my personal favorites, this scent brings out the rich bitch in all of us. A refreshing, flowery feminine fragrance. Ruby red grapefruit, blue poppy and star jasmine infuse with lower notes of sandalwood, amber and musk.

Secret Lover: A sexy blend of leather, men's cologne, ambered vanilla & a splash of organic sweet orange oil.

Biodegradable & dermatology-tested for use as a massage oil & body moisturizer as well as a candle. 

Made from NON-GMO Eco Soy wax.

Containers can be washed out with soap & water & re-used or recycled.

Candles burn approximately 10 hours per ounce

Smoked Maple Bacon: The sweet, smokey scent of bacon with a touch of maple

Watermelon Bubblegum: Sweet, mouthwatering watermelon... another classic from childhood. Simply delicious!

Wet Dirt: Really... it smells like dirt!

name: Charity Candles
description:
Hand crafted from an Organic Coconut Butter and non-GMO Soy wax. Completely biodegradable, they are the most amazing massage candles you will ever experience!

50% of the proceeds benefit The National Parkinson's Foundation, Elyssa's Mission or The Benton House directly.

Parkinson’s disease is the second most common neurodegenerative disease after Alzheimer’s, affecting about one million people in the United States and an estimated four million worldwide. The Center for Disease Control rated complications from Parkinson’s disease as the 14th leading cause of death in the United States. The prevalence of the disease is expected to increase substantially in the next 20 years due to the aging of the population in the U.S., Europe and globally, as well as an increase in the age-related incidence of the disease. The economic burden of Parkinson’s disease is estimated to be $6 billion annually in the U.S. Learn more about Parkinson's disease.
For over half a century, the National Parkinson Foundation (NPF) has focused on meeting the needs in the care and treatment of people with Parkinson’s disease (PD). NPF has funded more than $172 million in care, research and support services. Our Patchouli Rosewood candle is not only loved by almost everyone, the essential oils used are believed to be beneficial to those suffering from Parkinson's. This one's for you, Joe! We miss you! xoxo

Elyssa was a bright, beautiful, extremely outgoing girl. What made her happy was a house full of family and friends. She was an avid reader and liked to journal and write poetry. She saw things as either right or wrong. She had a tremendous amount of empathy towards kids who were treated unfairly. She was impulsive and lived life to the fullest. She was a risk taker but cared what the result was and how people perceived her. She was very sensitive. She pretended to be tough on the inside but wasn't. She was funny and made funny faces to get you to laugh. She tried to help others with their problems. She loved her friends and they were her world.

When Elyssa was twelve years old she was sexually assaulted by a teenage boy. Following the assault, Elyssa was hospitalized and diagnosed with post traumatic stress disorder. I was informed by her team that Elyssa had a predisposition to depression. I was told by her doctors that the sexual assault and the bullying by her peers pushed her over the edge.

Elyssa’s Mission Foundation provides resources to support at-risk teens and prevent suicide. It offers hands-on support to area schools, religious and community organizations to help educate students, staff and parents on how to recognize those teens most at risk. Elyssa’s Mission is proactive in funding, distributing, and implementing the SOS Signs of Suicide® program, as well as other prevention programs that are evidence based and backed by mental health professionals.

When you purchase a candle with the Elyssa's Mission Holiday logo, 50% of the proceeds go directly to the organization!

Find out more at http://www.elyssasmission.org/

Benton House is an independent non-profit 501(c)3 organization providing social services for the Bridgeport community in the city of Chicago for over 100 years.

Benton House was part of the early 20th century settlement house movement. It was founded as Providence Day Nursery in 1907 by Janett Sturges offering day-care support for mothers who worked in local factories. The nursery provided the children with three meals a day and weekly health check-ups by a local doctor. For the parents, nutrition clinics and English classes were offered in the evening.

In 1916, a building addition included the House of Happiness, a recreational site for older children. The House of Happiness offered classes in reading, woodshop, sewing, sports, arts, dance and home economics. Citizenship classes were also held for the increasing number of immigrants migrating to the area.

In 1938, Pearse Hall and Gymnasium was built “for healthful recreation and skilled instruction promoting social responsibility and personal enrichment through group activity.” This building includes classrooms, a large gymnasium, lockers, showers, stage, woodshop, and kitchen. 

In 1942, the facilities were renamed “Benton House” in tribute to the founder’s daughter, Katherine “Ma Benton” Sturges Benton who took over its direction.

Over the years, Benton House became a place where the neighborhood gathered for concerts, events and political rallies.

Rich in history, Benton House has always remained rooted in its original mission, as many of its programs, services, and buildings stand as a tribute to previous generations. With unyielding determination, the organization will continue to grow to meet the needs of present and future generations.

Today, Benton House runs a food pantry that feeds 500 families in the Bridgeport area as well as an organic community garden. They offer an after-school program for children, an audio engineering and event production job-training program designed specifically for youth and Youth Technology Corps (YTC) dedicated to transforming the lives of teens in challenged communities by connecting them to 21st century technology so they can discover new interests, learn relevant life/job skills and develop the confidence to secure a better future for themselves and their communities. They are also in the process of developing a music program & building their very own library.

When you purchase a candle with the Benton House logo, 50% of the proceeds go directly to the organization!

Find out more at http://www.bentonhouse.org
